title: Numbers
content:
Numbers: is there a font, which contains this kind of numbers?  
or are they custom made?  
Thanks in advance.

 [‹ Lovely serif font... But what's it called?!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207163815/http:/typophile.com/node/52416 "Go to previous forum topic") [fireplace - serif and serif italic ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081207163815/http:/typophile.com/node/52421 "Go to next forum topic")
author: blch

comments.content: Those look like Eurostile light, or possibly a variety of Handel Gothic
